story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does Gravel Rocks land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Gravel Rocks? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Gravel Rocks scored 43 out of 100. Grassroots tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Gravel Rocks. North York Moors, UK. 55 mi. UK North York Moors gravel.
beats.text_on_screen: Gravel Rocks | North York Moors, UK | 55 mi
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Let's go through the scores. Technicality. 3 out of 5. The course bites if you stop paying attention. Private Duncombe Park Estate trails and North York Moors terrain should offer technical challenge, but the 'all levels welcome' marketing suggests they've neutered the difficulty. Elevation. 3 out of 5. Proper climbing. You'll earn your descents. 4000ft over 55 miles through North York Moors National Park's undulating terrain delivers sustained climbing efforts across the private estate. Adventure. 3 out of 5. This race takes you somewhere different. Private estate access through Duncombe Park and North York Moors National Park offers exploration potential you can't replicate on public roads. Value. 3 out of 5. Fair value. You get what you pay for. £125 weekend entry includes two nights camping, parking, access to private estate trails, chip timing, feed stations, showers, and event village entertainment. Logistics. 2 out of 5. Basic setup. Don't expect hand-holding. Helmsley location in North Yorkshire requires planning as registration opens Friday at 13:00 and Saturday at 07:30. Length. 2 out of 5. Won't destroy your week. The 10km Friday night stage feels like warm-up filler before Saturday's substantial 92km across morning (52km) and afternoon (40km) loops. Climate. 2 out of 5. Mostly pleasant. Check the forecast anyway. Historical weather data shows average highs of 65°F and lows of 51°F, with a 68% chance of rain on any given day. Prestige. 2 out of 5. Building a name. Not there yet. Organized by Focal Events (creators of Europe's largest gravel event, Dirty Reiver) with SCOTT Sports UK as title sponsor for 2026.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: And the rest of the scorecard. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Adequate. Room for improvement. Experience. 2 out of 5. Pleasant enough. Won't change your life. Community. 2 out of 5. Riders acknowledge each other. Barely. Expenses. 2 out of 5. Your wallet will remember this. Briefly. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Oxygen plentiful. Power output normal. Field Depth. 1 out of 5. Sparse start line. Plenty of elbow room.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: STRENGTHS
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment
beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.narration: What they don't put on the website.
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

beats.label: LOGISTICS

broll_sources.query: North York Moors, UK travel guide

beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Lodging: North York Moors has limited lodging. Plan ahead.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: UK North York Moors Gravel. If you're local to UK. yes, it's solid. If you're traveling internationally. skip it.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Gravel Rocks isn't quite right for you. For better UK races: Lauf Gritfest.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Gravel Rocks? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

meme_inserts.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic reveal pose, tier badge prominent, 'Gravel Rocks' bold text, tier badge 'GRASSROOTS', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. SEO-optimize title for '[Race Name] review'.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Shorts: hook, biggest surprise score, verdict.
cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.
